error.failedCommand: An error occured while executing this command!

general.name: General
general.description: > Verily, no additional particulars are provided.

debug.name: Debug
debug.description: > Forsooth, meant to troubleshoot the automaton in case aught is awry or doth linger overmuch.

music.name: Music
music.description: > A broad array of behests thou may employ to behold mine exquisite musical prowess.

ping.commandDescription: Let us witness how swiftly Ranni doth react to thy shot.

detailedDescription.title: Ping
detailedDescription.description: Showeth thee how long I needeth to devote myself unto thee.
detailedDescription.returns: > The present reaction time of Ranni, in units of "miliseconds" (ms).

ping.title: *Pong* - Verily, a splendid strike!

message.close: By my troth! How swiftly thou didst strike... I had but a moment of [] to parry thy blow.
message.normal:
Hoho, didst thou behold that? It took me a whopping [] to react.
 > That was close. >-<
message.slow:
Goaugh... Oh WAIT! I just dozed off. Wow, [] is way too much. I'll endeavor to concentrate more!
 > *Mayhap I should procure a coffee or some such?*

help.commandDescription: Presenteth a list of commands anon.

detailedDescription.title: Help
detailedDescription.returns: > A list of all the perks that Ranni doth bestow.

menu.title: What dost thou inquire?
menu.description: If thou art uncertain of what thou seek, a bar below shall display all commands enumerated.

help.commandTitle: Here hast thou that which thou sought.
